purpleculture_pinyin:
diē
dad
папа
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 多 indicates the sound; 父 (father) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
老爹 [ lǎo diē ]: (dialect) father; old man; sir
爹娘 [ diē niáng ]: (dialect) parents
干爹 [ gān diē ]: adoptive father (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)
公爹 [ gōng diē ]: husband's father
爹地 [ diē dì ]: daddy (loanword)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 父 [ fù ] father, dad
    • 多 [ duō ] much, many, multi-; more than, over
heisig_chinese_memo: A father with a newly adopted son will only get the title of "Dad" after many years of good parenting.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A father with a newly adopted son will only get the title of "Dad" after many years of good parenting.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " father ", " many " sound, the original meaning is father. "Guangya‧ Shiqin": "Father, father too." "Liang Shu·Siheung Wang Xu Biography": "King Siheung, the father of the people; going to people is like water and fire. When will I come back to breastfeed me?"

" Father " can mean a respectful name for an elderly man. Ming Wangqi's "Miscellaneous Yupu" volume: "There are old historians in his hometown...return to the deep mountains to refine the practice. At the beginning of the country, there was a Pingzhang, since the Yuan Dynasty descended, the Taizu ordered the west to expedition, and he was on his way across the orchid , When you encounter it, get off the horse and worship again, shouting: "Father, it's still all right!

" Father " The child servant's honorific name to the master. Yuan Liu Junxi's first discount on the "Next Life Debt": "Father, why do you think I have these two sticks on my eyes? I live a day's life in the day, and I am afraid that I will take a nap and fall asleep at night and miss your home. Life, so these two sticks are supported on it."
humanum_short_description_en: From " father ", " many " sound, the original meaning is father.
humanum_full_description:
從「父」，「多」聲，本義為父親。《廣雅‧釋親》：「爹，父也。」《梁書‧始興王憺傳》：「始興王，民之爹；赴人急，如水火。何時復來哺乳我？」

　　「爹」可表示對老年男子的尊稱。明王錡《寓圃雜記》卷上：「其鄉有老御史者……歸隱深山中，精修煉之術。國初有某平章，自元來降，太祖命西征，過蘭途中，遇之，下馬再拜，呼曰：『爹，尚在無恙！』」

　　「爹」僮僕對主人的尊稱。元劉君錫〈來生債〉第一摺：「爹，你道我為甚麼眼上支着這兩根棒兒？我白日裏做了一日生活，到晚來恐怕打盹睡着了，誤了你家生活，因此上支着這兩根棒兒。」

爹字的基本解释

爹
diē
父亲：爹爹。爹娘。
对老人或长者的尊称：大爹。老爹。

爹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［diē］
［《廣韻》陟邪切，平麻，知。］
［《廣韻》徒可切，上哿，定。］
(1)父亲。
(2)对老年男子的尊称。
(3)僮仆对主人的尊称。

dad, father, daddy
